allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add LLM agent for automated tubercle detection \(Phase 2\)

Features:
- New fish_scale_agent package with Claude provider for LLM-driven detection
- Three-phase detection process: extraction, visual analysis, connection generation
- Usage tracking with token counts and cost estimation
- Debug rectangle tool to verify coordinate understanding

Improvements:
- MCP server: add debug shapes API for visualization
- Screenshot renderer: support debug rectangles with corner markers
- Workspace: auto-refresh polling \(2s\) to show MCP state changes
- Overlay: render debug shapes, source-based tubercle coloring \(extracted vs manual\)
- Fix extraction coordinate mismatch by using web_path instead of original TIF

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add OpenRouter provider for LLM agent

- New openrouter.py provider using OpenAI-compatible API
- Support for many models: Claude, GPT-4, Gemini, Llama, Mistral
- Vision support for screenshot analysis
- Usage tracking with cost estimation
- Update CLI to support --provider openrouter

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add OpenRouter how-to guide and expand model support

Documentation:
- Complete guide for signing up and using OpenRouter
- Tiered model recommendations \(Premium/Budget/Free\)
- Pricing tables for all supported models
- Provider notes for Z.ai, xAI, Qwen, Mistral

Models added to pricing dictionary:
- Mistral: Pixtral-Large, Pixtral-12B, Mistral-Small \(+free\)
- Qwen: QwenVL models with free tiers
- xAI: Grok-4, Grok-4-Fast, Grok-4.1-Fast, Grok-2-Vision
- Z.ai: GLM-4.5, GLM-4.5-Air, GLM-4.6V \(vision\)
- DeepSeek: Listed for reference \(no vision support\)

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
